review: So far, so good. It does take a bit of time to add the logon and password information. Someone, somewhere, sometime, needs to make that easier to do. All that back and forth, up and down, and what-have-you. But, the device is working. It's much more straightforward that the previous method through our DVD player. Also, we plan to take it with us on a trip to a somewhat remote (somewhat in that wi-fi is available) and watch some of our faves while taking it easy.
